title: Coco
short_plot_summary: Young Miguel pursues his love for music in the enchanting Land of the Dead, uncovering a hidden family secret along the way.
explanation: Miguel, the young protagonist of the movie
A guitar, representing Miguel's passion for music
A skull, symbolizing the Land of the Dead, where Miguel goes on his adventure
A flower, symbolizing the marigold petals used as a bridge between the living and the dead during the Day of the Dead celebration
The flag of Mexico, indicating the movie's setting and cultural background
